review: The Amazon app on my smart TV is pretty stupid and crashes all the time, so I basically bought this to improve my Amazon Prime streaming experience. I really like the FireTV, and finally having closed caption and preview during fast forward and re-wind is very nice, seeing my watchlist etc. I would give this 5 stars if a few improvements were made. 1) it never goes to sleep unless I select Sleep from the system menu 2) You should not have to click so deep into the GUI to see the price of the movie or if the movie is even available yet, put all that info up front as you're browsing, you basically have to go 3 levels deep in the interface before you can even decide if you want (or can) watch the movie. Its frustrating to see a movie you'd like to watch, click again just to see "Currently Unavailable". In addition, improvements should be made to allow you to custom order your watchlist, see an indicator when you've already watched a movie (after a year you sometimes forget what you've watched) and add a sort feature based on user or IMBD ratings when browsing categories or genre. I understand Amazon probably does not want features that drive everyone towards the same highly rated content, but this is what people want. Other than these issues I love the FireTV, its fast and greatly improves the experience over smart TV apps.
